questions.question: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a type of ______________ that allows computers to think and learn like humans.
AI can be used for various tasks such as ______________, healthcare, and education.
The development of AI has the potential to revolutionize many fields including ______________ and transportation.
AI systems often rely on large amounts of ______________ data to improve their performance.
One of the benefits of AI is that it can help automate ______________ tasks, freeing up time for humans to focus on more creative work.
